amendment.description: Amendment requires the Department of Housing and Urban Development to notify grant applicants of a technical deficiency and allow the applicant to submit a correction within 7 days of notice.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to require the Department of Housing and Urban Development to notify grant applicants of a technical deficiency and allow the applicant to submit a correction within 7 days of notice.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kucinich amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
